definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Market economy system can be divided into upper organization and lower organization.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济结构分层包括下层组织和上层组织。

sentences.english: The tectonic stress the Earth are mainly on the upper lithosphere.
sentences.chinese: 地球内部构造应力主要集中于岩石圈上层。

sentences.english: The upper staircase is suspended from the ceiling by white rods that create a minimal balustrade.
sentences.chinese: 上层楼梯利用从天花板悬挂下的白棒作为扶手栏杆。

sentences.english: Grapple over the wall, run to the back and grapple onto the upper balcony.
sentences.chinese: 翻墙进去跑到后面然后用抓钩上到上层的阳台。

sentences.english: Those who belonged to the higher classes were subjected to taunts and ridicule.
sentences.chinese: 属于上层社会的一些穆斯林会被嘲弄，被奚落。

sentences.english: Knight system is rooted in the superstratum society of mid-century Europe.
sentences.chinese: 骑士制度产生于中世纪欧洲的上层社会。

sentences.english: Four fixed rings need to be added on upper deck for derrick holds.
sentences.chinese: 吊货舱上层甲板上应装4个固定环。
上层建筑保持防火巡回检查。

sentences.english: This will be the top-level page in this book.
sentences.chinese: 这会成为这份手册的上层页面。

sentences.english: At the top of the country's film industry, the mood is both bullish and ebullient.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利电影界的上层，充满了昂扬和热情洋溢的气氛。

sentences.english: Most of the upper castes worship the Goddess Kali.
sentences.chinese: 印度上层种姓多数崇拜女神时母。

sentences.english: But superstratum has a problem, american economy also has a problem.
sentences.chinese: 但上层有问题，美国经济也有问题。

sentences.english: Democracy is part of the superstructure.
Full-height glazing on this level provides views over the perimeter wall to the lake beyond.
sentences.chinese: 上层的全玻璃幕墙提供了到湖边的视野。

sentences.english: The upper layer of dye intercepts high-energy light, such as ultraviolet.
sentences.chinese: 上层的染料拦截象紫外线这样高能量的光线。

sentences.english: The display wall extends over four storeys, drawing visitors towards the upper floors.
sentences.chinese: 展示墙一直向上面四层延伸，去吸引上层的游客。

definition: top floor/the top of a building
ground or first floor/bottom (of a pile)/lowest rung (of society)
royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
